column3: Rapha's done more to turn cycling into a sport for moneyed knobs than anything else in the last 50 years.
Ive seen many rapha ads, tis one is not up to d standard
Top video. I nuovi video Rapha non sono all'altezza di questo.
Video bello. I video Rapha di qualche anno fa sono migliori.
Finally did this loop, in September of 2018. It was epic and hard!!
what is up with the crying
I can only assume the emotions displayed by the guy at the end of the video came as a result of his full realization that he had spent more on his new Rapha kit than he had for his college education.
How do we get involved in these? We see a load of these guys on our rides on a regular basis.
when is the next Rapha Gentlemen's Race Malaysia?
